mapper.select:
SELECT bm.bm_no, bm.bm_title, bm.bm_writer, bs.bs_file , bm.bm_hit, bm.bm_group, bm.bm_pos, bm.bm_step FROM SCOTT.BOARD_MASTER_T bm, SCOTT.BOARD_SUB_T bs WHERE bm.bm_no = bs.bm_no(+)
AND bm_no = #{bm_no}
AND bm_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND bm_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND bm_writer LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
ORDER BY bm.bm_group desc, bm.bm_step asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_master_t(bm_no, bm_title, bm_writer, bm_reg, bm_hit , bm_group, bm_pos, bm_step) VALUES(seq_board_no.nextval, #{bm_title}, #{bm_writer}, to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , 0, #{bm_group}, #{bm_pos}, #{bm_step})
INSERT INTO board_sub_t(bm_no, bs_seq, bs_file, bs_size) VALUES(#{bm_no}, 1, #{bs_file}, #{bs_size})
